programme.desc: In this classic encounter from the 2006/07 campaign, West Ham welcome Spurs to Upton Park for a thrilling, end-to-end London derby.

programme.title: Premier League Icons
programme.desc: A chance to recall the impact on the Premier League of Manchester United's Dutch striker Ruud van Nistelrooy.

programme.title: Premier League Years
programme.desc: All the best moments from the 2014/15 season which saw Chelsea crowned champions once again under the management of Jose Mourinho.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Highlights of a high-scoring encounter at the Liberty Stadium between Swansea City and Crystal Palace in 2016.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Charlton Athletic take on West Ham United at the Valley in November 2001 in a pulsating encounter that went down to the wire.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Highlights of the last Manchester derby played at Maine Road in 2002.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Highlights from the six-goal thriller at Vicarage Road in October 2006.

programme.title: The Best Premier League Goals
programme.desc: A look back at the most memorable goals from the 2000/01 season.

programme.title: The Best Premier League Goals
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best goals from Premier League meetings between Manchester United and Newcastle United.

programme.title: PL 100 Club
programme.desc: A selection of Peter Crouch's finest goals for Liverpool, Tottenham Hotspur, Portsmouth and Stoke City.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Liverpool play host to Chelsea at Anfield in the 2000/01 season, with both clubs battling for places in Europe near the season's end.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Wigan Athletic meet West Ham United at the DW Stadium in May 2011 in a crucial clash in the battle to avoid relegation.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Wayne Rooney bags a hat-trick in this classic game at Upton Park in 2011 as West Ham face Manchester United.

programme.title: Premier League Greatest Games
programme.desc: Highlights of the eight-goal thriller at Stamford Bridge in 2011 when Chelsea played Arsenal.

programme.title: Premier League Years
programme.desc: A look back at Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, the focus is on the 2015-16 season, where a surprise title winner stunned the entire footballing world.

programme.title: Premier League: The Big Interview
programme.desc: Once described by Nelson Mandela as 'my hero', Lucas Radebe reflects on his story, from growing up in apartheid-era South Africa, to achieving star status at Leeds United.

programme.title: Saturday Social
programme.desc: Steven McInerney and Specs join Adam Smith and Joe Thomlinson to discuss the football trends on social media. Southampton's Che Adams and Tino Livramento play Pick One, Kick One.

programme.title: Soccer AM
programme.desc: Fenners and Jimmy are joined by ex-Spurs and Norwich player Sebastien Bassong and ex-jockey AP McCoy. Smoove & Turrell perform live and Luton Town tackle You Know The FIFA Drill.

programme.title: Gillette Labs Soccer Saturday
programme.desc: The build-up to Saturday's football across the country, with analysis of all the potential team news and talking points for the day's games.

programme.title: Gillette Labs Soccer Saturday
programme.desc: As the goals go in, stay up to speed with the afternoon's football up and down the country, as updates come in from the studio and around the grounds.

programme.title: Live: Crystal Palace v Manchester City
programme.desc: Crystal Palace (6-9-10) fell to Aston Villa in its last outing, 1-0, following a scoreless draw with Liverpool; Manchester City (18-4-4) won its last head-to-head meeting with Palace, 4-2, for its first victory in the all-time series since 2021.

programme.title: Game of the Day
programme.desc: A complete airing of a key match from today's Premier League fixtures.

programme.title: Premier League Highlights
programme.desc: The best of the action from Goodison Park as Everton face Brentford in a battle for three precious points.

programme.title: Premier League Highlights
programme.desc: Brighton and Hove Albion pay a visit to Elland Road to face Leeds United.

programme.title: Premier League Highlights
programme.desc: All the key moments from the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium as Spurs play Nottingham Forest.
